artist: Painter: After Abraham Hondius; Engraver: John Smith
description: half length portrait of Abraham Hondius facing left looking at viewer; holding a picture of a classical female figure wearing helmet in right hand and pointing with left; head tilted right
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

below image in black: [ Abrahamus Hondius Pictor/ Ipse pinx  I Smith fecit et ex.] on sheet in pencil: [1-558]; on verso in pencil: [rare L/B]
title: Portrait of Abraham Hondius
